title: The owner shall give an undertaking that the recreational open space shall be for the common use of all the residents or occupants of the layout / building unit
clause_text: The owner shall give an undertaking that the recreational open space shall be for the common use of all the residents or occupants of the layout / building unit.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
